TypeSignature.Value: .class nested protected auto ansi sealed AxHost/AboutBoxDelegate extends System.MulticastDelegate

summary.span: 代表將顯示 ActiveX 控制項之 [關於] 對話方塊的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will display an ActiveX control's About dialog box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 讓您能夠在 ActiveX 控制項的 [關於] 方塊會顯示時收到通知。The provides you the ability to be notified when the ActiveX control's About box is going to be displayed. [關於] 對話方塊顯示之前，會執行程式碼新增至委派方法。Code added to the delegate method is executed before the About box is displayed. 當您建立委派，識別的方法，將處理的 ActiveX 控制項之 [關於] 對話方塊中顯示，如果有的話。When you create an delegate, you identify the method that will handle the display of an ActiveX control's About dialog box if it has one. 若要與您的處理常式關聯的方法，將新增至方法的委派的執行個體。To associate the method with your handler, add an instance of the delegate to the method. 除非您移除委派，每當呼叫方法時，會呼叫處理常式。The handler is called whenever the method is called, unless you remove the delegate. 如需有關委派的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例會覆寫建構函式，而並方法衍生包裝 Microsoft 遮罩編輯 ActiveX 控制項的類別。The following example overrides the constructor, and the and methods of an derived class that wraps the Microsoft Masked Edit ActiveX Control. 此程式碼假設您已建立產生的原始程式碼 MSMask32.ocx 檔案上執行 AxImp.exe`/source`切換到產生的包裝函式類別，以進行編輯。This code assumes you have created the generated source code by running the AxImp.exe on the MSMask32.ocx file with the `/source` switch to generate the wrapper class to be edited. 此程式碼是只顯示在 C# 語法，因為那是唯一的語言輸出 AxImp.exe。This code is only shown in C# syntax as that is the only language output by the AxImp.exe. [!code-csharp[AxHost_Wrap_MaskEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AxHost_Wrap_MaskEdit/CS/axmsmask.cs#1)]
